description: Lists the data sources in a knowledge base and information about each one.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base for which to return a list of information.

nested_items.name: dataSourceSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of objects, each of which contains information about a data source.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the data source.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the data source.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base to which the data source belongs.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the data source.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data source.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the data source was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
